content: 3 5mm crochet hook 4ply yarn chain - chain treble_crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet r1 - ch3 14 treble_crochet in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch into beg ch3 r2 - ch2 1tr into same space as 2ch 2tr into each st to end slip_stitch into beg of ch2 r3 - ch2 1tr into each st until end slip_stitch into beg of ch2 r4-8 - as r3 r9 - ch1 *2dc 1slst repeat from * to end slip_stitch into chain and fasten off
